CrewAgent.description: An intelligent agent in CrewAI framework
usage_examples: CrewAgent(role='Researcher', goal='Search the web for information', tools=search_tools, verbose=True)

CrewTask.description: A task to be performed by a CrewAI agent

Crew.description: A group of agents working together on tasks

CrewTool.description: Tools available for agents to perform tasks

common_user_intents.make agents collaborate: Create a Crew with multiple CrewAgents and assign specific CrewTasks to each
common_user_intents.coordinate activities: Use the Crew class to coordinate activities between different agents
common_user_intents.divide work among agents: Assign different CrewTasks to different CrewAgents within a Crew
